author: Mal0
install_msg: GitHub Sync cog installed. Use [p]ghsyncset to configure tokens, repo, and forum channels.
name: GitHubSync
short: Sync ACTIVE GitHub issues and PRs with Discord forum posts.
description: Optimized sync for OPEN GitHub issues/PRs only. Creates forum posts, syncs comments/tags bidirectionally, and auto-deletes Discord threads when GitHub issues are closed. Uses GraphQL for fast API access.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores configuration like channel IDs and GitHub repository metadata. It does not store personal data beyond what Discord inherently provides.
